title: Hello World!

title: Joshua Morrison
text:
LinkedIn
  
  
    
     GitHub
  

  
  
I’m Joshua Morrison, a Data Scientist and public health informatics professional. I use large-scale claims and electronic health record data to inform healthcare quality measurement, especially for patients with chronic conditions. I’m an aspiring semantic data specialist; I’ll be using this site to chronicle my self-led study of semantic data tools.
More about me…

EXPERIENCE
Data Scientist II National Committee for Quality Assurance (NCQA) Jul 2024-Present Washington, DC (Remote)
Data Scientist DaVita Kidney Care Aug 23-Jul 2024 Denver, CO


EDUCATION
University of Colorado Boulder Post-baccalaureate Bachelor of Science (BSc), Computer Science Aug 2024-Present Boulder, CO
Colorado School of Public Health Master of Public Health (MPH), Applied Biostatistics Aug 2017-May 2019 Aurora, CO
University of Colorado Denver Bachelor of Science (BSc), Biology Aug 2012-May 2015 Denver, CO
